item.title: Critical week for US's future in Ukraine-Russia talks, Rubio says
item.description: It is a "very critical" week for the White House and its involvement, Secretary of State Marco Rubio tells US media.

item.title: Dozens of African migrants killed in US strike on Yemen, Houthis say
item.description: Houthi-run media report 68 bodies have been recovered from a detention centre in Saada that was holding African migrants.

item.title: Mount Fuji climber rescued twice after going back for lost phone
item.description: He returned to Mount Fuji four days after his initial rescue in the hopes of finding his phone.

item.title: Canada votes in pivotal election transformed by Trump
item.description: The US president came to dominate on the campaign trail, with the contest being viewed as a referendum on how Canada should engage with him.

item.title: N Korea confirms it sent troops to fight for Russia in Ukraine war
item.description: It comes just days after Russia's Valery Gerasimov praised the "heroism" of North Korean troops.
